framer-motion.currentUsage: Full library imports with motion, AnimatePresence, useScroll, useTransform
framer-motion.implementation: Replace full imports with specific component imports

recharts.optimizedApproach: Bundle already tree-shakeable in current form
recharts.implementation: Verify unused chart components are removed

@radix-ui.optimizedApproach: Audit and remove unused Radix components

optimizationPlan.approach: Replace motion imports with specific component imports
Audit and remove unused Radix UI imports
files: All component files using Radix UI
optimizationPlan.implementation:
// Audit process:
1. Scan for @radix-ui imports
2. Verify each component is actually used
3. Remove unused imports
4. Consolidate similar component usage

optimizationPlan.approach: Remove unused chart components and optimize imports
optimizationPlan.implementation:
// Chart component audit:
1. Identify which chart types are actually rendered
2. Remove unused chart imports (PieChart, AreaChart if not used)
3. Optimize ResponsiveContainer usage

// Icon audit:
1. Search for imported icons that aren't used in JSX
2. Remove unused icon imports
3. Consolidate similar icons across components

framingStrategy.step1: Analyze current motion component usage patterns
framingStrategy.step2: Replace grouped imports with individual imports
framingStrategy.step3: Test for any breaking changes in animations
framingStrategy.expectedOutcome: 15-20 kB reduction in motion-related bundle size
